name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault
display_help: Your mastery of Martial Assault allows you to deliver crippling blows to your enemies and rain blades upon foes who don't dare approach you. You deliver damage to your enemies via withering kicks and punches in melee range, while your skills with thrown blades cut down aggressors from afar. Your attacks have a tendency to knock opponents down or deal additional damage over time as a secondary effect.

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Shuriken_Throw
powers.display_help: You impale your foe with a thrown shuriken, dealing moderate Lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Thunder_Kick
powers.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 8.94s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 4s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Trick_Shot
powers.display_help: You take careful aim and bounce a thrown shuriken between multiple targets. Note that Trick Shot is unaffected by Range changes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Chain — 20 ft. jump distance (5 targets max)

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Spinning_Kick
powers.display_help: You perform a high spinning reverse roundhouse kick, smashing anything in front of you with devastating force. You can activate this ability at any time, no matter what you have targeted; it will strike enemies directly in front of your character, rather than enemies near your target. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 9 ft. radius 90° arc (5 targets max)

display_info: 60.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Envenomed_Blades
powers.display_help: You add a toxic venom to all of your attacks for a moderate duration. All damaging powers gain bonus Toxic damage. You also gain a moderate bonus to your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Dragons_Tail
powers.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown

display_info: 75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
75.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Caltrops
powers.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any villains that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Masterful_Throw
powers.display_help: You take careful aim and let loose an extremely accurate, extremely forceful blade. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Martial_Assault.Explosive_Shuriken
powers.display_help: You rig a shuriken with a powerful explosive, then send it flying towards your enemies. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Fire), Minor Splash Damage (Fire DoT)
